The High Priest of Prana:
God be with you the glory of the great Light ....
Having lived in this world long enough to gain experience, I decided to go down to the village and educate people.
People willing to turn to the true faith can be found in every corner of the world. If they are highly misleading, I feel even more value to their work.
Since I am a representative of humanity, I can not complain. It would be unfair if it is assigned to the case who knows nothing about the world of a young girl.
